TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 205
TEI.2.document_title: Erasmo Seguin to Stephen F Austin, 04-16-1829

barker_notes.barker_summary: Erasmo Seguin to Austin, Bexar, April 16, 1829. Instructing Austin to make minor improvements on land which Austin has granted him. Wants to comply with the law with minimum expense. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 205

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Erasmo Seguin to Austin, Bexar, April 16, 1829. Instructing Austin to make minor improvements on land which Austin has granted him. Wants to comply with the law with minimum expense. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="04-16-1829">April 16, 1829*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*See Calendar.*/p*
*/div1*
